author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two motorists were killed when a State Express Transport Corporation (SETC) bus lost control and hit them near the Swadeshi Bharati mills on Cuddalore Road here on Friday.

Victims

The victims were identified as Viswanathan (24), son of Govindaraj, a police head constable of Kombakkam and Manohar (55) of Ariyankuppam.

Police said Viswanathan was riding his two-wheeler to the bus stand when the SETC going from Chennai towards Velankkani hit him resulting in his instantaneous death.

The bus then hit Manohar who was riding a motorcycle with his wife Selvasundari on the pillion and dashed against the two-wheeler of Ravichandran (44) and stopped.

Driver fleds scene

The driver of the SETC bus fled the scene.

The injured were referred to the Government General Hospital and later referred to Jipmer where Manohar succumbed to his injuries.

Police have registered a case.
title: Two motorists killed in accident
